about_the_game:
Enjoy the booming brass and percussion of one of opera’s most famous songs as part of your purchase of the Expansion Pass 1 for Hearts of Iron IV. First performed in 1856 as part of Richard Wagner’s Die Walküre, the Ritt der Walküren (The Ride of the Valkyries) has become synonymous with dramatic action and terror from the skies. This bonus is available immediately upon buying the Expansion Pass 1.

This new arrangement from composer Martin Hall adds more percussion and strings, as well as a fuller choir to add even more energy and vigour as the shieldmaidens of Odin descend from Valhalla to claim the fallen heroes of the battlefield.

This content might be made purchasable individually at a later date
detailed_description:
Hearts of Iron IV: Expansion Pass 1


About the Game

Enjoy the booming brass and percussion of one of opera’s most famous songs as part of your purchase of the Expansion Pass 1 for Hearts of Iron IV. First performed in 1856 as part of Richard Wagner’s Die Walküre, the Ritt der Walküren (The Ride of the Valkyries) has become synonymous with dramatic action and terror from the skies. This bonus is available immediately upon buying the Expansion Pass 1.

This new arrangement from composer Martin Hall adds more percussion and strings, as well as a fuller choir to add even more energy and vigour as the shieldmaidens of Odin descend from Valhalla to claim the fallen heroes of the battlefield.

This content might be made purchasable individually at a later date
